attributes.action: Stop David Lammy giving away Gibralta territory to Spain.
attributes.additional_details: Nobody wants changes to Gibralta or ANY overseas territory that would affect the lives of those living or visiting from Britain. Stop selling out OUR territory. Britains do NOT want you to!!
attributes.background: Leave Gibralta borders as they are. It is British territory. The people who live there want to remain British. Any changes would go against their Human Rights. Especially without a National vote!!

rejection.details:
On the 11th of June the government reached a political agreement with the EU which will secure Gibraltar's economy, provide certainty for people and businesses in Gibraltar and protect British sovereignty:

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/agreement-protects-sovereignty-and-economic-security-of-gibraltar
